info.name: Supraoptic recess of the third ventricle
info.description: The supraoptic or optic recess is located in the inferior aspect of the third ventricle in front of the optic chiasm and at the base of the lamina terminalis.
info.item: /Gross/Brain stem & Cerebellum/Brain stem/11 Brain stem - mid-sagittal view
/Gross/Brain stem & Cerebellum/Brain stem/12 Brain stem - parasagittal view
